lib.delegated module documentation¶

The lib.delegated provides a common API for loading and querying the RIR-style stat files, those that can be found at the FTP servers of each RIR.

Delegated API¶

Delegated API Class (c) carlos@lacnic.net

Load the stats file specified in the constructor.

looks for exact matches inside the delegated records

resource_find_inside(w_resource)[source]¶

Looks for w_resource inside assignments

resource_query(query, parameters)[source]¶

runs a generic query returning a db cursor
